text: How could anyone resist a $12 beauty product that makes your skin glowier, bouncier and dewier all at once? Turns out, you can’t. Even celebrities with access to exclusive facials and the fanciest skincare on the planet still swear by Weleda Skin Food , which is 24% off on Amazon for a limited time. Drew Barrymore recently told her studio audience that she slathers this rich moisturizer all over her face at night and wakes up looking like she had a facial. Zooey Deschanel is also a fan, revealing to The Strategist that she uses yhr product as a dry skin treatment. The cream has a large cult following, with regular users applying it to dry elbows, cracked cuticles and even frizzy ends when their hair’s acting up. There are so many uses for this pick, we're actually surprised it's not more pricey! Get Weleda Skin Food for $9 (originally $12) on Amazon.
